text: vah kitaab mein tumapar yah hukm utaar chuka hai ki jab tum suno ki allaah kee aayaton ka inakaar kiya ja raha hai aur usaka upahaas kiya ja raha hai, to jab tab ve kisee doosaree baat mein na laga jaen, unake saath na baitho, anyatha tum bhee unheen ke jaise hoge; nishchay hee allaah kapataachaariyon aur inakaar karanevaalon - sabako jahannam mein ekatr karanevaala hai
